name: Dead Synchronicity: Tomorrow Comes Today
summary: Tomorrow Comes Today” tells the story of Michael, a man with no past, who must recover his identity and decode the two events that brought the world to the edge of collapse. The first one is the so-called “Great Wave,” an inexplicable chain of natural disasters.
info:
• 中文名: 死亡同步
  • 平台: 任天堂Switch， PlayStation 4， Android， 微软视窗， iOS， Linux， macOS
  • 游戏类型: Adventure, Other
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2015年4月10日
  • 售价: US$9.99
  • 官方网站: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/dead-synchronicity-tomorrow-comes-today-switch/
